{///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////}{|||     || ||     || |||||||||  ||||||||  |||||||  ||||||||}{||||    || ||     || ||         ||     ||       || ||      }{|| ||   || ||     || ||         ||     ||       || ||      }{||  ||  || ||     || ||||||     ||||||||    |||||  ||||||| }{||   || || ||     || ||         ||     ||       ||       ||}{||    |||| ||     || ||         ||     ||       ||       ||}{||     |||  |||||||  |||||||||  ||||||||  |||||||  ||||||| }{///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////} /////////////////nuebs auto choper puls drop///////////////////this is chop plus drop v3.0                              ////this vercion uses SRL more noe that i lerned how to do it////drag the cross hair into the runescape screen and do the ////setup in lines 23-27  have fun autoing =)                /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// program New;{.include SRL/SRL.scar}{.include SRL/SRL/skill/WoodCutting.scar}{.include SRl/SRL/core/AntiRandoms/AntiRandoms.scar}var q,counter:integer;const///////////set up////////////////////////////////TreeColor = 7577792;// first color of tree     //TreeColor1 = 4155248;// second color of tree   //TreeColor2 = 4290672;// third color of tree    //TreeColor3 = 5406848;// fourth color of tree   //loads = 2;//how manyy loads to chop n drop     ///////////////////////////////////////////////////{//////////////dont touch below////////////}procedure chop;beginrepeatif(Findcolorspiral(x,y,TreeColor,0,0,750,500))and   IsUpText('Chop')or(Findcolorspiral(x,y,TreeColor1,0,0,750,500))and   IsUpText('Chop')or(Findcolorspiral(x,y,TreeColor2,0,0,750,500))and   IsUpText('Chop')or(Findcolorspiral(x,y,TreeColor3,0,0,750,500))and   IsUpText('Chop')then   wait(200);   mouse(x,y,2,2,true)   Flag;   FindEnt(TreeColor)   FindNormalRandoms;   FindHead;   wait(4500);   flag;   until(invfull)   end;   procedure report;   begin   writeln('')   writeln('[][][][][][][][][][][][][]')   writeln('        thanx for         ')   writeln('          using           ')   writeln('    nuebs power cutter  ')   writeln('      droped '+inttostr(q)+' logs ')   writeln('')   writeln('[][][][][][][][][][][][][]')   writeln('')   end;procedure drop;beginDropTo(2,28);q:=q+27;end;beginSetupSRL;FindAxeHeadColorrepeatchopdropuntil(counter = loads)report;end.

item.title: Wc plus drop v 3.0
item.dc:creator: @nueb35 Nueb35
item.description:
@nueb35 wrote:

this version has antirandoms uses SRL to drop insted of all that stuff i put… it will look for ax if it goes off and will re atach it if it works i wanna know so post here wat ever happens wen used!! =) have fun
[scar]{///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////}
{||| || || || ||||||||| |||||||| ||||||| ||||||||}
{|||| || || || || || || || || }
{|| || || || || || || || || || }
{|| || || || || |||||| |||||||| ||||| ||||||| }
{|| || || || || || || || || ||}
{|| |||| || || || || || || ||}
{|| ||| ||||||| ||||||||| |||||||| ||||||| ||||||| }
{///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////}

/////////////////nuebs auto choper puls drop/////////////////
//this is chop plus drop v3.0 //
//this vercion uses SRL more noe that i lerned how to do it//
//drag the cross hair into the runescape screen and do the //
//setup in lines 23-27 have fun autoing =) //
/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

program New;
{.include SRL/SRL.scar}
{.include SRL/SRL/skill/WoodCutting.scar}
var q,counter:integer;
const
///////////set up////////////////////////////////
TreeColor = 7577792;// first color of tree //
TreeColor1 = 4155248;// second color of tree //
TreeColor2 = 4290672;// third color of tree //
TreeColor3 = 5406848;// fourth color of tree //
loads = 2;//how manyy loads to chop n drop //
/////////////////////////////////////////////////
{//////////////dont touch below////////////}
procedure chop;
begin
repeat
if(Findcolorspiral(x,y,TreeColor,0,0,750,500))and
IsUpText(‘Chop’)or
(Findcolorspiral(x,y,TreeColor1,0,0,750,500))and
IsUpText(‘Chop’)or
(Findcolorspiral(x,y,TreeColor2,0,0,750,500))and
IsUpText(‘Chop’)or
(Findcolorspiral(x,y,TreeColor3,0,0,750,500))and
IsUpText(‘Chop’)then
wait(200);
mouse(x,y,2,2,true)
Flag;
FindEnt(TreeColor)
FindNormalRandoms;
FindHead;
wait(4500);
flag;
until(invfull)
end;
procedure report;
begin
writeln(’’)
writeln(’[][][][][][][][][][][][][]’)
writeln(’ thanx for ‘)
writeln(’ using ‘)
writeln(’ nuebs power cutter ‘)
writeln(’ droped ‘+inttostr(q)+’ logs ‘)
writeln(’’)
writeln(’[][][][][][][][][][][][][]’)
writeln(’’)
end;
procedure drop;
begin
DropTo(2,28);
q:=q+27;
end;
begin
SetupSRL;
FindAxeHeadColor
repeat
chop
drop
until(counter = loads)
report;
end.[/scar]

Read full topic
